hc.server.msb

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hc.server.msb.Converter

  • public abstract class Converter
extends Object
    Converter is useful to convert data format between Robot and Device (device also means data source for cloud), when format between them is inconsistent.

    when Device or data source is upgraded, you can still keep Robot unchanged,

    for example, Robot R (in HAR project proj_r) drive Device A (in HAR project proj_dev_a). If Device A is substituted by Device B, then do as following:
    1. remove HAR project proj_dev_a from server,
    2. add HAR project proj_dev_b,
    3. add HAR project proj_cvt_c, which Converter A_to_B is included in,
    4. bind Reference Device ID (in Robot R) to real device ID (in Device B) and set Converter A_to_B between them.
    See Also:
    Robot, Device, Message

    • Method Detail

      • downConvert

        public abstract void downConvert(Message fromRobot,
                                 Message toDevice)
        convert Message fromRobot to Message toDevice.

        after converting, the toDevice will be dispatched to target, the fromRobot will be recycled by server.

        it is NOT allowed to keep any references of Message in the instance of Converter.

        to print log about creating/converting/transferring/recycling of message, please enable [Option/Developer/log MSB message].
        Parameters:
        fromRobot - the message will be auto recycled by HomeCenter server.
        the Message is NOT allowed to modified any parts, because this Message may be consumed by other Converter.
        toDevice - the target format Message.
        Since:
        7.0
        See Also:
        upConvert(Message, Message)

      • upConvert

        public abstract void upConvert(Message fromDevice,
                               Message toRobot)
        convert Message fromDevice to Message toRobot.

        after converting, the toRobot will be dispatched to target, the fromDevice will be recycled by server.
        it is NOT allowed to keep any references of Message in the instance of Converter.

        to print log about creating/converting/transferring/recycling of message, please enable [Option/Developer/log MSB message].
        Parameters:
        fromDevice - Message will be converted from.
        toRobot - Message will be converted to.
        Since:
        7.0
        See Also:
        downConvert(Message, Message)
